channel.title: 317 Auto Cache Downloader
channel.description: Can someone help me, I need a auto cache downloader for my server. Its a 317 delta. I searched on google but couldn't find one.

item.title: 317 Auto Cache Downloader
item.dc:creator: @TrisidiaX TrisidiaX
item.description:
@TrisidiaX wrote:

svrking27:

i got same problem, i have the link in autocachedownloader file in client but whenever i run it it doesnt download just says error cant find main file cache n closes out

make sure its a winrar zip folder and make sure it is only the files in your sprite folder not the sprite folder itself. (Data, Jframe) all those files and everything in the folder,.

item.title: 317 Auto Cache Downloader
item.dc:creator: @example123 example123
item.description:
@example123 wrote:

[quote=“TrisidiaX, post:2, topic:450056”][quote author=Vodzila link=topic=552951.msg4051658#msg4051658 date=1342571709]
Can someone help me, I need a auto cache downloader for my server. Its a 317 delta. I searched on google but couldn’t find one.
[/quote]
Ok this is very easy
Step 1- Get a dropbox account
Step 2- get winrar
Step 3- take you cache from your c:\ and add it in a winrar .zip not a .rar! (Only add into the zip file what is in ur cache folder. not ur cache folder in ur c:\ open it and u should see a folder with sprites etc. add those files into the zip file.
step 4- Take the .zip file that u have added ur cache files in and add it to public dropbox
step 5- in you client open CacheDownloader.java find the coding "private String cacheLink = " there should be a link there just replace that one with the dropbox link to ur cache and BAM DONE![/quote]

yo you got skype

Read full topic

item.title: 317 Auto Cache Downloader
item.dc:creator: @TrisidiaX TrisidiaX
item.description:
@TrisidiaX wrote:

Vodzila:

Can someone help me, I need a auto cache downloader for my server. Its a 317 delta. I searched on google but couldn’t find one.

Ok this is very easy
Step 1- Get a dropbox account
Step 2- get winrar
Step 3- take you cache from your c:\ and add it in a winrar .zip not a .rar! (Only add into the zip file what is in ur cache folder. not ur cache folder in ur c:\ open it and u should see a folder with sprites etc. add those files into the zip file.
step 4- Take the .zip file that u have added ur cache files in and add it to public dropbox
step 5- in you client open CacheDownloader.java find the coding "private String cacheLink = " there should be a link there just replace that one with the dropbox link to ur cache and BAM DONE!

Read full topic
